content.en: Artificial Art Analysis: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms, specifically Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) and Deep Learning, to analyze and classify art images. They are investigating whether these algorithms can be fine-tuned for tasks such as art-related image classification, predicting aesthetic evaluation and sentiment, improving style classification, and even art authentication. The goal is to leverage the power of machine learning to enhance our understanding and appreciation of art.
content.da: Kunstig kunstanalyse: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer, specifikt Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) og dyb læring, til at analysere og klassificere kunstbilleder. De undersøger, om disse algoritmer kan finjusteres til opgaver som kunstrelateret billedklassifikation, forudsigelse af æstetisk vurdering og sentiment, forbedring af stilklassifikation og endda kunstautentificering. Målet er at udnytte maskinlæringens kraft for at forbedre vores forståelse og værdsættelse af kunst.
